issue.title: URL shortener site datayi.cn is blocked
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11 (54)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://datayi.cn/w/a9By0BOo

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. URL shortener service datayi.cn is blocked. E.g. https://datayi.cn/w/a9By0BOo redirects to https://leetcode.com/discuss/study-guide/3458761/Open-to-Registration!-30-Days-of-LC-JavaScript-Challenge/?utm_campaign=Banner2&utm_medium=Banner&utm_source=Banner&gio_link_id=a9By0BOo

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/735878/236588008-d464614a-16e8-4541-af50-c6586217f1fe.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

So you have that banner with all current rules?

comment.body:
After updating filters, **most** Banners are now fixed 👍 In summary for now (translated my own, don't know how to set up page in english): Settings for Ads -> banner advertisement -> Layout -> Reading area -> hide -> fixed Settings for Ads -> banner advertisement -> Layout -> Reading area -> show on right -> fixed Settings for Ads -> mailbox view -> Layout -> Reading area -> hide -> fixed Settings for Ads -> mailbox view -> Layout -> Reading area -> show on right-> fixed Now there is a combination that still shows Ad for me. Inbox Ads with "relevance inbox" under miscellaneous. Enable "Postfachanzeigen (recommended)" ![grafik](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/33e7d50b-8c87-47d1-9854-1705765867b1) Now, also Enable this in Settings: ![grafik](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/e90401f8-f982-48bb-a24e-5a83fde86a91) Now click on "Sonstiges" (miscellaneous?). It showing the Ad twice for me for both reading settings "Hide" and "right reading area": ![grafik](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/9f183f8f-ae7d-441d-85c3-8e4b33967666) Here is what I get:
Screenshot-1: ![grafik](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/2db42cde-ac7b-4749-bafd-52ab651c14b5)

Both banners highlighted:
Screenshot-2: ![Unbenannt](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/296ac104-b38b-4dd8-beb0-f312e27c2f3e)

When I change Ad settings back to "Banner Ad", the "Sonstiges" tab doesn't show Ads.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.55

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://dwazoo.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Tracking
```
mediadelivery.net/.metrics/
rum-metrics.bunny.net/trackperformance
```


<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/110184059/236609374-71e1189d-4375-4475-98b0-fbce0f4f835b.png)

</details>




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/149657#issuecomment-1529438044 
Unfortunately, I can't reproduce the ads on this site. In the case of the desktop application - try to mutually exclude AdGuard and Kaspersky from filtering. In the case of the extension - try to update filters and clear browser cache.
||collector-*.px-cloud.net^ - logging, not tracking. also breaks some functions

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

4.0

Website or app doesn't work properly

Microsoft Edge

Mobile

https://www.cnn.com/2023/05/04/europe/kremlin-drone-attack-analysis-intl/index.html

_No response_

Cant play videos

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

:

comment.body:
It's not the incorrect blocking - AdGuard Widgets, which is the part of the AdGuard Annoyances, blocks it as mentioned in the desciption.
If you want to use this chat, you can either do next:
* Add the rule to My filters, after that refresh the page.
```adblock
@@||tidiochat.com^$domain=openshop.com.hk
```
* Exchange AdGuard Annoyances to [our new filters](https://adguard.com/en/blog/new-annoyance-filters.html) except AdGuard Widgets. To do it:
	* Disable AdGuard Annoyances
	* Paste this links at the end of the Filters - Import
	```
	https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/18.txt
	https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/19.txt
	https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/20.txt
	https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/21.txt
	```

Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.
Moved.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

AdGuard for Android

4.0

Website or app doesn't work properly

Microsoft Edge

Mobile

https://www.cnn.com/2023/05/04/europe/kremlin-drone-attack-analysis-intl/index.html

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version Version 2.10.0.1272 release ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://music.apple.com/ ### What filters do you have enabled?
